Roles.title: Data Scientist
Roles.description: Analyzes and interprets complex digital data to assist a company in its decision-making processes.

Roles.title: Machine Learning Engineer
Roles.description: Designs and develops machine learning and deep learning systems, runs tests and experiments to monitor the efficiency and functionality of such systems.

Roles.title: Deep Learning Engineer
Roles.description: Specializes in using deep learning frameworks to design, build and maintain scalable machine learning models.

Roles.title: AI Research Scientist
Roles.description: Focuses on developing new algorithms and models in artificial intelligence to advance the capabilities of AI technologies.

Roles.title: Lead Data Scientist
Roles.description: Leads a team of data scientists in designing and implementing models and algorithms that drive the analytical capabilities of the business.

Roles.title: Senior Machine Learning Engineer
Roles.description: Possesses advanced experience in machine learning and typically works on designing sophisticated models and algorithms that are crucial for the company's products.

Roles.title: Data Analytics Manager
Roles.description: Oversees the data analysis and data science operations within the company, ensuring that insights gained from data analyses are actionable and relevant.

Roles.title: Director of Machine Learning
Roles.description: A senior position responsible for all aspects of machine learning projects, from development to deployment and maintenance.

Roles.title: ML Ops Engineer
Roles.description: Works on the operationalization of machine learning models, including automation, scaling, and integration into production environments.

Roles.title: Quantitative Analyst
Roles.description: Applies mathematical and statistical models to solve financial and risk management problems, often using machine learning techniques.
